post.body:
Guild-specific search is now supported - searching from a guild will limit search results to content within that guild. This change was authored by @crystalvulpine.

For the devs out there, the comment fetch API will now also return information about the comment's parent comment.
post.body_html:
Guild-specific search is now supported - searching from a guild will limit search results to content within that guild. This change was authored by @CrystalVulpine.

For the devs out there, the comment fetch API will now also return information about the comment's parent comment.
post.title: Ruqqus patch 2.26.4 - Improvements to search and to comment json api.

body:
But they adapt over time to become weaker so they *don't* kill the host and can live and reproduce longer. This is why the initial outbreak in Wuhan was so much worse than everywhere else.

Until a week ago, apparently. I honestly feel like they released a second version of the virus. There's no other explanation for how it suddenly became a real threat. I know people who had it, most likely myself too, and I know people who work hospitals. And until now, all of them said it was nothing, and that they barely even got sick (except stronger in a few cases) and that hospitals had plenty of resources. But now, overnight almost all people who get it are becoming sicker than they could ever imagine, and hospitals are overflowing, and I can confirm this as well. From the same virus that barely caused a fever for most people just a week ago. Interestingly this also applies to the flu, which is also now becoming very deadly which was rare before a week ago. I have no idea how that's even possible.
body_html:

I know people who had it, most likely myself too, and I know people who work hospitals. And until now, all of them said it was nothing, and that they barely even got sick (except stronger in a few cases) and that hospitals had plenty of resources. But now, overnight almost all people who get it are becoming sicker than they could ever imagine, and hospitals are overflowing, and I can confirm this as well. From the same virus that barely caused a fever for most people just a week ago. Interestingly this also applies to the flu, which is also now becoming very deadly which was rare before a week ago. I have no idea how that's even possible.

guild.description:
Aggression is political, ideological, corporate, and contractual - it's more than violence. 

So, this is an alt-libertarian guild that sheds all of the inadequacy and cowardice of a non-aggression principle as it's currently understood in a world where we live shackled to the tyranny of popular taste and popular aggression. 

We explore ways in which modern, pacifist "libertarianism" has failed and we come up with ways to meet the various aggressions against our freedoms. 

Associated Guilds:

+Realmsteading 

+PPluDo

+Psykewar

The discord invitation has been replaced with an OAuth2 application authorization which adds the user to the discord server. As we grow, this integration will allow us to offer improved service to users who contact us on Discord.

To get to Discord, just click here: https://ruqqus.com/discord

We also removed the announcements modal since it's basically been replaced by +changelog.

guild.description:
"For God so loved the world, that He gave His only begotten Son, that whoever believes in Him shall not perish, but have eternal life. For God did not send the Son into the world to judge the world, but that the world might be saved through Him. He who believes in Him is not judged; he who does not believe has been judged already, because he has not believed in the name of the only begotten Son of God. This is the judgment, that the Light has come into the world, and men loved the darkness rather than the Light, for their deeds were evil. For everyone who does evil hates the Light, and does not come to the Light for fear that his deeds will be exposed. But he who practices the truth comes to the Light, so that his deeds may be manifested as having been wrought in God."

May all personally encounter the presence and attention of the Lord God. 

Curiosity, questions, discussion, and prayer requests are welcome.

body:
Not disagreeing with you, but that is not what this passage is saying. First of all, it's in the context of interpreting prophesies in church. The other thing is that the word confusion is actually ⲀⲔⲀⲦⲀⲤⲦⲀⲤⲒⲀⲤ (ΑΚΑΤΑΣΤΑΣΙΑΣ if your browser can't show that charset), which means confusion more in the sense of literal disorder or chaos, not difficulty understanding. This makes much more sense with the proceeding "but of peace". Basically, it's just Paul writing a letter to a church and in this part he is giving them advice on how to organize this process in a peaceful, respectful manner.

However in regards to the question, I think it depends.
body_html:
Not disagreeing with you, but that is not what this passage is saying. First of all, it's in the context of interpreting prophesies in church. The other thing is that the word confusion is actually ⲀⲔⲀⲦⲀⲤⲦⲀⲤⲒⲀⲤ (ΑΚΑΤΑΣΤΑΣΙΑΣ if your browser can't show that charset), which means confusion more in the sense of literal disorder or chaos, not difficulty understanding. This makes much more sense with the proceeding "but of peace". Basically, it's just Paul writing a letter to a church and in this part he is giving them advice on how to organize this process in a peaceful, respectful manner.

However in regards to the question, I think it depends.

body: I never saw you give an example of anyone you thought is a good jew. Other than that I just don't understand how race makes someone part of a secret plot, I think their large amounts of power are more tradition and inheritance than anything else. A lot of jewish families have always had a culture of climbing the ladder, so a lot of them made up the elites at some point, which then got passed down to future generations who sustained it. It's not because of a conspiracy, though I'm sure conspiracies exist among those elite groups it's not a "jewish" thing.

Other than that I just don't understand how race makes someone part of a secret plot, I think their large amounts of power are more tradition and inheritance than anything else. A lot of jewish families have always had a culture of climbing the ladder, so a lot of them made up the elites at some point, which then got passed down to future generations who sustained it. It's not because of a conspiracy, though I'm sure conspiracies exist among those elite groups it's not a "jewish" thing.

body: This doesn't look like a ban to me. It says "on request" so that probably means it was requested to be shut down. If you bought the account from a third party, it's not unlikely that they sold it to you and then later requested a refund and ripped you off. Be careful with those kinds of things.
body_html: This doesn't look like a ban to me. It says "on request" so that probably means it was requested to be shut down. If you bought the account from a third party, it's not unlikely that they sold it to you and then later requested a refund and ripped you off. Be careful with those kinds of things.

post.body:
@nerds 

Here we go. Bring your facts, at your leisure. No rush, we can drag this on for as long as necessary. You said [the Nazis gassed the Jews](https://ruqqus.com/+StrangeCoincidences/post/4zb8/written-by-rosa-silverman/h99q). 

Go!

I'm going to ask that we not downvote the believers. I don't want to discourage them from presenting their cases, and the downreps are apparently offending/discouraging them.

body: First of all how is this relevent, secondly it comes from most jews also being ethnically jewish, so most of them would have the big noses.

parent.body: Where does the big nose stereotype come from then? Do you mean to suggest they get that look from attending a Synagogue? That is from a certain biological extraction.
